title: 04 - Staying Close to God with Beth Moore
description:
Join us today as we talk about abiding in Christ and spending time with God. Beth has been a spiritual hero of so many of us, and her faith comes from a deep well of time with God over her lifetime. Connection with God is the foundation of everything we will talk about this season! {This episode pairs with chapter 8 of Get Out of Your Head book}

Read Beth's new book "Chasing Vines": chasingvines.com

Listen to the Bible anytime, anywhere with our favorite app called DWELL, use this link to get 10% off the year plan! https://dwellapp.io/jennie
